Program Description: Rebate up to $200 on an Energy Star certified heat pump water heater
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
• Uniform energy factor of 2.20 for 120V/15A.
• Must be ENERGY STAR certified.
Contractor Restrictions: Work must be performed by a Colorado Contractor. Do-it-yourself work does not qualify.
Other Restrictions:
• This rebate is for retrofit applications only and does not apply to new construction.
• Provide a Pikes Peak Regional Building Department permit number and pass inspection to qualify for the rebate
• Must be installed according to manufacturer’s instructions, including ducting for heat exchanger airflow when recommended by
manufacturer.
• Two (2) rebates available per service address every three years
